com.microsoft.office.sfb.appsdk

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.office.sfb.appsdk.Application

  • public final class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the top-level entry point for the App SDK. It provides access to all entities and services.

      • joinMeetingAnonymously

        public AnonymousSession joinMeetingAnonymously(java.lang.String displayName,
                                               java.net.URI meetingUri)
                                        throws SFBException
        Joins a meeting anonymously as a 'guest', without requiring sign-in to a Skype for Business account.
        Parameters:
        displayName - Name of the guest user, which will be visible in all Skype for Business clients that also join the meeting.
        meetingUri - URI of the meeting.
        Returns:
        AnonymousSession Returns and anonymous meeting session. The Anonymous meeting session provides the related conversation.
        Throws:
        SFBException - Exception thrown with appropriate error code in case of failure.
        See Also:
        This method is intended to be used on-prem only. For online meetings use another method and provide discover URL and authorization token instead of meeting URI. This method can be called repeatedly at any time. It automatically disconnects any existing meetings.

      • joinMeetingAnonymously

        public AnonymousSession joinMeetingAnonymously(java.lang.String displayName,
                                               java.net.URL discoverUrl,
                                               java.lang.String token)
                                        throws SFBException
        Joins a meeting anonymously as a 'guest', without requiring sign-in to a Skype for Business account.
        Parameters:
        displayName - Name of the guest user, which will be visible in all Skype for Business clients that also join the meeting.
        discoverUrl - Discover URL of the meeting.
        token - Authorization token.
        Returns:
        AnonymousSession Returns and anonymous meeting session. The Anonymous meeting session provides the related conversation.
        Throws:
        SFBException - Exception thrown with appropriate error code in case of failure.
        See Also:
        This method can be called repeatedly at any time. It automatically disconnects any existing meetings.

      • setAlertCallback

        public void setAlertCallback(AlertObserver.OnAlertCallback callback)
        Adds a callback to subscribe for global alerts. Clients should extend the AlertObserver.OnAlertCallback interface to handle the alert.
        Parameters:
        callback - Alert callback.
        See Also:
        AlertObserver, Alert
